concept.title: Caramel Frappe
concept.shortdesc: Frappes are a refreshing drink to have in the morning. The base of a frappe is ice-cold coffee, which would be perfect for a warm day when a hot coffee is just not right.

conbody.p: A Frappe is a cold caffeinated drink that tastes delicious and is easy to make. All you need is the coffee, milk and some type of sweetner. There are many different variations of this solid combination, so the frappe possibilities are endless.
